product_title: LAV Odin Rock Tumblers, 330ml, (Single Piece) – ODN430

detail.name: LAV Odin Rock Tumblers, 330ml, (Single Piece) – ODN430

details.description_text: Brand: LAV Origin: Turkey Material: European Crystal Glass Product: Odin Rock Tumblers Capacity: 330 ml (Each) Series: Odin Style: Tumbler Dimensions: Diameter: 8.5 cm, Height: 9 cm Color: Clear Features: Etched grid line design, heavy base, break-resistant, non-toxic, dishwasher safe, recyclable LAV Odin Rock Tumblers – Elegant, Durable, and TimelessElevate your drinkware collection with the LAV Odin Rock Tumblers, a beautifully crafted glasses designed for both style and functionality. Made in Turkey from high-quality European crystal glass, these tumblers are perfect for serving a variety of beverages, from classic cocktails to soft drinks. With their etched ‘Grid Line’ decoration and heavy base, they make a striking style statement in any setting, whether at home, in a bar, or at a restaurant.Key Features: ✅ Premium Quality: Made from durable, break-resistant European crystal glass, ensuring long-lasting use. ✅ Etched ‘Grid Line’ Design: Features a unique and elegant grid line pattern that adds a touch of sophistication to classic and contemporary spaces alike. ✅ Heavy Base: The robust design ensures stability and durability, making it perfect for both home and professional use. ✅ Generous Capacity: Each tumbler holds 330 ml, ideal for serving cocktails, soft drinks, or any beverage of your choice. ✅ Safe & Non-Toxic: Made from high-quality, food-safe materials, ensuring peace of mind with every use. ✅ Dishwasher Safe: Easy to clean and maintain, making it a convenient addition to your kitchenware collection. ✅ Eco-Friendly: 100% recyclable and environmentally friendly, aligning with sustainable living practices. ✅ Stylish & Functional: Combines modern aesthetics with practicality, making it ideal for everyday use or special occasions.Why Choose LAV Odin Rock Tumblers? The LAV Odin Rock Tumblers are more than just drinkware – they are a statement of elegance and durability. Their etched grid line design and heavy base make them perfect for creating a vintage yet modern look, while their sturdy construction ensures they can withstand daily use. Whether you're hosting a party, running a bar, or looking for a thoughtful gift, these tumblers are a must-have for anyone who values style, functionality, and sustainability.Add the LAV Odin Rock Tumblers to your cart today and enjoy your favorite beverages in glasses that are as stylish as they are practical!

details.description_text: ✔️ 100% Pure Melamine – Durable, BPA-free & lightweight ✔️ Elegant Printed Design – Adds charm and color to your table ✔️ Perfect Size – 5.5 Inch / 350ml capacity ✔️ Shatter-Resistant – Safe for kids and adults ✔️ Lightweight & Handy – Easy to hold and carry ✔️ Versatile Use – Ideal for home, cafes, parties & picnics ✔️ Dishwasher Safe – Easy to clean & maintain ✔️ Stain-Resistant Surface – Keeps glasses looking new ✔️ Set of 6 Glasses – Complete set for family use ✔️ Durable & Long-Lasting – Designed for everyday use ✔️ Modern & Stylish – Perfect for indoor & outdoor settings ✔️ Safe for Everyday Use – Non-toxic and food-safe material ✔️ ১০০% খাঁটি মেলামাইন - টেকসই, BPA-মুক্ত এবং হালকা✔️ মার্জিত মুদ্রিত নকশা - আপনার টেবিলে আকর্ষণ এবং রঙ যোগ করে✔️ নিখুঁত আকার - ৫.৫ ইঞ্চি / ৩৫০ মিলি ধারণক্ষমতা✔️ ভাঙা-প্রতিরোধী - বাচ্চাদের এবং প্রাপ্তবয়স্কদের জন্য নিরাপদ✔️ হালকা ও সহজলভ্য - ধরে রাখা এবং বহন করা সহজ✔️ বহুমুখী ব্যবহার - বাড়ি, ক্যাফে, পার্টি এবং পিকনিকের জন্য আদর্শ✔️ ডিশওয়াশার নিরাপদ - পরিষ্কার এবং রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ করা সহজ✔️ দাগ-প্রতিরোধী পৃষ্ঠ - চশমাকে নতুন দেখায়✔️ ৬টি চশমার সেট - পারিবারিক ব্যবহারের জন্য সম্পূর্ণ সেট✔️ টেকসই এবং দীর্ঘস্থায়ী - দৈনন্দিন ব্যবহারের জন্য ডিজাইন করা✔️ আধুনিক এবং স্টাইলিশ - অন্দর এবং বহিরঙ্গন সেটিংসের জন্য উপযুক্ত✔️ দৈনন্দিন ব্যবহারের জন্য নিরাপদ - অ-বিষাক্ত এবং খাদ্য-নিরাপদ উপাদান

You can create this elegant atmosphere in your dining table with these 6 iconic drinking glasses by Nasir Glass LARGE TUMBLERS FOR ALL KINDS OF DRINKS: These drink tumblers can be used for both cold and hot beverages, since they have resistance to thermal shocks. The 12.5oz tall drinking glasses are ideal to sip any beverage, from hot coffee and cappuccino to juices and iced drinks. STACKABLE, SPACE SAVING DESIGN: These water glasses have a practical stackable design, so you can carry them around with safety and store them in your kitchen cabinets with ease. In other words, the stackable soda drinking glasses are going to help you save space! PREMIUM QUALITY TEMPERED GLASS: These coke drinking glasses are made with premium quality tempered glass, thanks to which they are resistant to breakage, chipping and dishwasher wear. So feel free to use and wash the beverage glasses daily! WASH IN THE DISHWASHER WITHOUT ANY FEAR: Our drinking tumblers are crystal clear and they make any drink look refreshing! And don’t worry – the dishwasher will NOT stain the walls of the glassware drinking glasses, nor will it make them cloudy. #glass Enjoy your beverage with full satisfaction The glasses does not contain any harmful chemicals such as BPA, phthalate, PVC, or polycarbonate, so nothing can leach into your beverage from the glass. Made of glass enabling the color of the beverage to shine. Elegant look and adds to any table's aesthetics with their contemporary design. Increase the overall drinking experience and is strongly recommended by health experts.
